case_title: GUL KHATOON vs Haji MUHAMMAD ASLAM and 13 others
respondents: Respondent No. 12 (SHO PS New Sariab Quetta)

facts.allegations: Abduction of Mst. Khadija by private respondents on gunpoint and failure to register F.I.R. due to police influence.
facts.petition_prayer: Production of abductee and registration of F.I.R. against respondents Nos. 1 to 11.

findings.abductee_statement: Mst. Khadija stated she was not abducted and married Abdul Rehman with her free will and consent.

legal_basis.concept_of_wali: Consent of Wali not required for sui juris Muslim female.

legal_references: Mst. Shazia and another v. S.H.O. Police Station Kumb, District Khairpur and 7 others, 2011 YLR 493 (Karachi)
Hafiz Abdul Waheed v. Mrs. Asma Jehangir, PLD 2004 SC 219
conclusion: The abductee is an adult sui juris Muslim female who exercised her social and civil rights to marry Abdul Rehman of her own free will. Allegations of abduction are baseless. Petition dismissed with no orders as to cost.
